duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as the central point of contact and subject matter expert for internal and external customers regarding fastener application troubleshooting and design.
Responsible for the technical aspects regarding fastener-related issues and joint problems, developing fastener applications, driving results to align with customer objectives.
Assist customers, and licensee sales and engineering groups with fastener design efforts as well as provide best practice expertise during joint design.
Assist laboratory manager with test design and data analysis.
Provide on-site customer support and training as necessary.
Identify and highlight market and organizational opportunities and assist with the implementation of continuous improvement projects to adapt to the always evolving needs of the market.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in mechanical engineering or related field or equivalent experience within the fastener industry.
